main event: A flat and oblong object flashing red, green, and white was observed moving in a zigzag pattern to the west.
interesting points: The object was described as flared and oblong, with the size of a head of a pin.
The object was observed flashing red, green, and white colors.
The object was moving in a zigzag pattern to the west.
An aircraft was reported to be in the area at the time of the sighting.
The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes.
